// ACTION TYPE SET_MUSIC_FIELD
export var SET_MUSIC_FIELD='SET_MUSIC_FIELD';// Set music fields in the upload new music modal
export var setMusicField=function setMusicField(value,name){return{type:SET_MUSIC_FIELD,name:name,value:value};};// ACTION TYPE SEND_MUSIC
export var SEND_MUSIC='SEND_MUSIC';// Action Creator sendMusic
export var sendMusic=function sendMusic(dateValue){return{type:SEND_MUSIC,dateValue:dateValue};};// ACTION TYPE GET_MUSICS_LIST
export var GET_MUSICS_LIST='GET_MUSICS_LIST';// Set music fields in the upload new music modal
export var getMusicsList=function getMusicsList(){return{type:GET_MUSICS_LIST};};// ACTION TYPE SET_MUSICS_LIST
export var SET_MUSICS_LIST='SET_MUSICS_LIST';// Set music fields in the upload new music modal
export var setMusicsList=function setMusicsList(musicList){return{type:SET_MUSICS_LIST,musicList:musicList};};// ACTION TYPE RESET_MUSIC_STATE
export var RESET_MUSIC_STATE='RESET_MUSIC_STATE';// Reset the state of the music reducer
export var resetMusicState=function resetMusicState(){return{type:RESET_MUSIC_STATE};};// ACTION TYPE SET_PROGRESS
export var SET_PROGRESS='SET_PROGRESS';// Reset the state of the music reducer
export var setProgress=function setProgress(progress){return{type:SET_PROGRESS,progress:progress};};// ACTION TYPE SET_ERROR_CODE
export var SET_ERROR_CODE='SET_ERROR_CODE';// Reset the state of the music reducer
export var setErrorCode=function setErrorCode(code){return{type:SET_ERROR_CODE,code:code};};
